extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns number of minutes of battery charge remaining, if a battery is installed. This attribute applies to both Mac and Windows.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsWindows:
On Error Resume Next Dim objBatteries Dim strBatteries Set objBatteries = GetObject("winmgmts:").InstancesOf("Win32_Battery") i=0 For each Battery in objBatteries if i <> 0 then strBatteries = "
" & strBatteries End If strBatteries = Battery.EstimatedRunTime & strBatteries i=i+1 Next WScript.Echo "" & strBatteries & ""
